title: Invitation to Love
description: Invitation to Love follows Jared Lancaster, owner of the Towers, his twin daughters Emerald and Jade, their ex-husband Chet Weems, and the dangerous Montana.
quote: Chester, you little Froot Loop, you’re done—done!
altHero: Chet Weems in an awkward embrace with a woman
alt1: Chet Weems, a weasley looking fellow
alt2: one of the twins is offered a drink
alt3: Jared Lancaster tied up and gagged
